case.title: rent = student - asian , latina , white - m4w - 30 (nyc)
case.text: Respectful gentleman hopes to meet a young, pretty female college or grad student for rewarding friendship. Please be intelligent, pretty and caring and we should get along together fine. A pic would be most appreciated. I am not a pic collector and will treat you with the utmost respect, i only ask that you do likewise. (puertorican , Columbian , Brazilian student ) age 18 - 22
